title: How You Can Use the New Stack Overflow Bot from Microsoft
Meet Gatebot - a bot that allows us to sleep
The Render Token
description: I wrote about OTOY over four years ago, in “Today I Saw The Future”. Since then, I have been inspired by the commitment of the founders Jules Urbach and Alissa Grainger to the vision that Jules enunciates: “… to render and remix simulated reality as effortlessly as the web did for text and digital media. …
